entries.name: pindex
entries.info: row number in the particle bank

entries.name: z
entries.info: @latex{z}: Momentum fraction of the fragmenting parton carried by the hadron

entries.name: PhPerp
entries.info: @latex{P_h^\perp}: transverse momentum of the hadron in the @latex{\perp}-frame (transverse to @latex{\vec{q}})

entries.name: MX2
entries.info: @latex{M_X^2(ehX)}: Missing mass squared of the hadron

entries.name: yB
entries.info: @latex{y_{h,B}}: Breit frame rapidity of the hadron

entries.name: phiH
entries.info: @latex{\phi_h}: @latex{q}-azimuthal angle between the lepton-scattering plane and the @latex{\vec{q}\times\vec{P}_h} plane; if the value is `tools::UNDEF`, the calculation failed

entries.name: xi
entries.info: @latex{\xi_h}: Longitudinal momentum fraction of the nucleon carried by the hadron

entries.name: z
entries.info: @latex{z}: Momentum fraction of the fragmenting parton carried by the dihadron

entries.name: PhPerp
entries.info: @latex{P_h^\perp}: transverse momentum of the dihadron in the @latex{\perp}-frame (transverse to @latex{\vec{q}})

entries.name: MX2
entries.info: @latex{M_X^2(ehhX)}: Missing mass squared of the dihadron

entries.name: yB
entries.info: @latex{y_{h,B}}: Breit frame rapidity of the dihadron

entries.name: phiH
entries.info: @latex{\phi_h}: @latex{q}-azimuthal angle between the lepton-scattering plane and the @latex{\vec{q}\times\vec{P}_h} plane; if the value is `tools::UNDEF`, the calculation failed

entries.name: phiR
entries.info: @latex{\phi_R}: @latex{q}-azimuthal angle between the lepton-scattering plane and dihadron plane; if the value is `tools::UNDEF`, the calculation failed

entries.name: theta
entries.info: @latex{\theta}: The 'decay' angle of hadron A in the dihadron rest frame, with respect; to the dihadron momentum direction

entries.name: epsilon
entries.info: @latex{\varepsilon(Q^2, x, y)}, the ratio of transverse and longitudinal photon flux

entries.name: pindex
entries.info: row number in the particle bank

entries.name: pcal_found
entries.info: 1 if PCAL info found for this particle, 0 otherwise

entries.name: ecin_found
entries.info: 1 if ECIN info found for this particle, 0 otherwise

entries.name: ecout_found
entries.info: 1 if ECOUT info found for this particle, 0 otherwise

entries.name: pindex
entries.info: row number in the particle bank

entries.name: r1_found
entries.info: 1 if Region 1 info found for this particle, 0 otherwise

entries.name: r2_found
entries.info: 1 if Region 2 info found for this particle, 0 otherwise

entries.name: r3_found
entries.info: 1 if Region 3 info found for this particle, 0 otherwise
